content:
The Annual Great Brews Beer Festival

November 19-20, 2016

Two days. Twice the fun.

This is the beer event of the season! Food and craft vendors, beer games, giveaways, live musical entertainment, and of course BEER!

Let the backyard game competitions begin with giant beer pong, drunken jenga, cornhole, and more! 

With crisp hard ciders, smooth stouts, hoppy IPAs, pale ales, and Sour Sunday, there's a beer flavor for everyone.

Each ticket includes complimentary beer glass for sampling, live musical entertainment, and beer samples. 

BUY TICKETS

VIP Tickets receive exclusive beer tastings, complimentary snacks, and a souvenir shirt and bag.

Lodging Packages are available now!
